column4: I have a question (general): How is it possible that a wifi connection between two computers (say transfering files) is so much slower than wifi connection between 1 computer and the internet (say downloading files)??
I have 688kb/s between Ubuntu and win7 (using samba) and a 5mbit/s connection between win7 and internet..
what do you mean by that exxon? Or I just google what you just said :D
check both wireless adapters are connected at max speed
